objects.specification: A large rectangular floor slab spanning twelve meters in width and eight meters in depth, with a subtle metallic sheen on its surface. The material is smooth and neutral-colored, featuring a slight brushed-metal texture that complements an automotive theme. The floor covers the full interior footprint of the booth and is designed to provide a stable, uniform platform for exhibits.

A tall back wall spanning the full twelve-meter width of the booth, three meters high, with a smooth matte finish in a light neutral tone. Constructed from lightweight panel sections, it provides a clean backdrop for brand imagery or graphics.

A partial side wall on the left side, six meters deep and three meters high, finished in the same light neutral matte material as the back wall. It encloses the space while leaving the front open for access.
A partial side wall on the right side, matching the left wall in size and finish, creating a consistent enclosure while leaving the central front space open.

A low rectangular raised platform, five meters wide and two and a half meters deep, standing 0.3 meters above the main floor. It has a sleek metallic finish with a subtle brushed pattern, designed to elevate and highlight the vehicle above the surrounding floor level.

A modern demonstration car with aerodynamic contours, a low sporty profile, and a high-gloss metallic paint finish. It features sleek LED headlights, tinted windows, and bespoke alloy wheels. The vehicle design emphasizes clean lines and a premium aesthetic, serving as the focal point of the booth.

A ceiling-mounted cylindrical spotlight with a polished metallic housing and a narrow beam angle, designed to focus bright, cool-white light onto the vehicle below. It has a modern industrial look with subtle ventilation slots.
